plot: Tasos Halkias plays a nerd in his thirties who spends all his time working and surfing on the Internet. Costas Regopoulos plays his father, a rich man with a passion for women and night ...
plot_en: Tasos Halkias plays a nerd in his thirties who spends all his time working and surfing on the Internet. Costas Regopoulos plays his father, a rich man with a passion for women and night ...

title: O ios tou patera
